question: Who launched the RailCloud Project, NIVARAN-Grievance Portal and CTSE Scheme?
explanation: Minister of Railways Shri Suresh Prabhakar Prabhu launched the following schemes Rail Cloud Project, NIVARAN-Grievance Portal (First IT Application on Rail Cloud), Cashless treatment Scheme in Emergency (CTSE) Scheme. 'NIVARAN-Grievance Portal' is the first IT application to be launched on the RailCloud. RailCloud is the next step towards Digitization of Railways. Rail Cloud works on popular Cloud Computing system.
